queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cscart_category_metro_cities` ( `link_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `metro_city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `category_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`link_id`), KEY `metro_city_id` (`metro_city_id`,`category_id`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cscart_cities` ( `city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `metro_city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `city` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`city_id`), UNIQUE KEY `city` (`city`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cscart_metro_cities` ( `metro_city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `state_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `metro_city` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`metro_city_id`), UNIQUE KEY `metro_city` (`metro_city`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=24 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cscart_product_cities` ( `link_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`link_id`), KEY `metro_city_id` (`city_id`,`product_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cscart_product_metro_cities` ( `link_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `metro_city_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`link_id`), KEY `metro_city_id` (`metro_city_id`,`product_id`) ) ;
